bibl.title: The Management of Estates in Roman Egypt and Italy.
Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. II
bibl.author: KEHOE, Dennis P.

bibl.note: Shortened version of a study that will form part of a larger investigation of economic goals of upper-class Roman landowners.
bibl.seg: KEHOE Dennis P., The Management of Estates in Roman Egypt and Italy.
Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. II (Cairo, 1992) pp. 91-102.
